issues.description: No validation for colonIndex being -1 when parsing headers, which could cause substring errors if a header doesn't contain a colon
Only captures the first Cookie header if multiple are present, ignoring subsequent cookie headers
Assumes cookie string always starts with 'Cookie: ', which may not be true if header case is different
Auth property can be overwritten if both -u and --user parameters are provided
serializeCookies function doesn't escape cookie values, potentially causing issues with special characters
